name: Attack
note:
<setup action>
display action
if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
camera focus: target
zoom: 150%, 20
camera offset: right, 50
else
camera focus: user
wait: 20
zoom: 100%, 20
camera offset: right, 50
end
immortal: targets, true
</setup action>

<Timed Attack: arrows>
Frames: 200
Command amount: 4
Randomize Command: up, down, left, right
<End Timed Attack>


<Use Timed Attack Action Sequences>
 
<target action>
if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
move user: targets, front, 20
else
perform start
end
wait for movement
timed attack
motion attack: user
wait: 10
attack animation: target
wait for animation
action effect
wait for animation
wait for movement
wait: 5
 
</target action>

name: Guard
note:
Skill #2 will be used when you select
the Guard command.

name: Coil Flash
note:
<Timed Attack: arrows>
Frames: 300
command amount: 6
Randomize Command: up, down, left, right
<End Timed Attack>
<Use Timed Attack Action Sequences>
<target action>
camera focus: target
zoom: 105%, 30
wait for zoom
opacity not focus: 0, 60
wait for opacity
move user: targets, back, 15
timed attack
opacity user: 50%, 4
wait for movement
face user: target
opacity user: 100%, 3
motion attack: user
action animation
animation wait: 15
action effect
opacity user: 25%, 2
move user: targets, front center, 10
opacity user: 100%, 3
face target: user
motion attack: user
action animation
action effect
animation wait: 10
immortal: target, false
face user: target
face target: forward
face user: target
wait for animation
wait for movement
</target action>
<follow action>
zoom: 100%, 60
opacity not focus: 100%, 60
wait for opacity
</follow action>

name: Coil
note:
<Timed Attack: arrows>
Frames: 300
command amount: 6
Randomize Command: up, down, left, right
<End Timed Attack>
<Use Timed Attack Action Sequences>

<target action>
camera focus: target
zoom: 105%, 30
wait for zoom
opacity not focus: 0, 60
wait for opacity
move user: targets, front, 5
wait for movement
timed attack
jump user: 120, 30
move user: FORWARD, 3, 10
wait for movement
move user: targets, back, 5
face user: target
wait for movement
wait for animation
face user: target
motion attack: user
action animation
animation effect
animation wait: 15
action effect
jump user: 120, 30
move user: BACKWARD, 3, 5
wait for movement
move user: targets, front, 3
face user: target
animation wait: 15
face user: target
motion attack: user
action animation
animation effect
animation wait: 5
action effect
immortal: target, false
face user: target
face target: forward
wait for animation
wait for movement
death break
</target action>
<follow action>
zoom: 100%, 60
opacity not focus: 100%, 60
wait for opacity
</follow action>

name: Penta
note:
<Timed Attack: arrows>
Frames: 300
command amount: 6
Randomize Command: up, down, left, right
<End Timed Attack>
<Use Timed Attack Action Sequences>
 
<target action>
camera focus: target
zoom: 105%, 30
wait for zoom
opacity not focus: 0, 60
wait for opacity

move user: targets, back, 5
wait for movement
face user: target
timed attack
motion attack: user
action animation
animation wait: 2
action effect
move user: targets, front center, 5
face user: target
motion attack: user
animation wait: 3
action effect
move user: targets, back top, 5
face user: target
animation wait: 3
action effect
move user: targets, front, 5
face user: target
motion attack: user
animation wait: 3
action effect
move user: targets, back center, 5
face user: target
motion attack: user
animation wait: 5

action effect
move user: targets, front, 10
immortal: target, false
jump user: 200%, 10
face user: forward
wait for animation
wait for movement
</target action>
<follow action>
zoom: 100%, 60
opacity not focus: 100%, 60
wait for opacity
</follow action>
